inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Tourette Syndrome for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum Tic rating scale of > or equal to 19 (current symptoms excluding impairment) at Visit 1 and Visit 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Rating scale severity score of > or equal to 4 (moderately ill) at Visit 1 and Visit 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to take oral medication in tablet form without crushing or otherwise altering the tablet
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adherence to medication regimens and willingness to return for regular visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine drug screening at Visit 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Generally good health as confirmed by medical history, baseline psychiatric history and physical examination
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to read and comprehend written instructions and willingness to complete all scales and inventories required by this protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of substance dependence or abuse (with the exception of nicotine or caffeine dependence) within the past 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant and unstable major psychiatric disorder requiring treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of alcohol consumption (60 units per week) and smoking (22 cigarettes per day), but no other significant medical conditions. He is generally healthy and meets most inclusion criteria.
